note:
Old romantic cynic. Live in #Sheffield, UK. #cycling is my main form of transport. Long retired now, but I volunteer one day a week with a charity for people with a disability who'd like to cycle but might find a regular two-wheeler a bit tricky for whatever reason. Keep Left.

Trained/educated in physics. Worked in hardware design (SystemX), research (cryogenics), software (various), and then IT - user support, training, teaching, management, writing (I wrote a textbook), quality.

fields.name: Interests
fields.value: Cycling, table-tennis, IT, physics, maths, language.

fields.name: Profile picture
fields.value: Profile pic is an older Caucasian male (me) riding a bike in Beijing.

fields.value: Header image is my English garden in summer.
